content: **scrapsumptious crochet blanket** **difficulty level | skills required** easy/adventurous beginner basic stitches in simple variations shaping and finishing you will need to know basic stitches like single_crochet single_crochet special stitches explained and provided in the instructions **materials** hook 4 00 mm g scissors yarn needle **yarn ** vinnis colours dk nikkim 100% cotton 50 grams/119 meters weight dk 11 wpi 3 light approx 18 x balls a dunes x 2 b mint x 4 c princess turquoise x 3 d turquoise x 3 e peacock x 3 f princess mink x 1 g cappuccino x 2 **yarn substitute ** using the same type of yarn throughout the project is recommended the pattern suggests dk yarn weight dk 11 wpi 3 light worsted but you are not limited to this type of yarn any yarn can be used if you take into consideration your sizing for the project will differ **gauge | gauge** gauge is not necessary for this project to be perfect however counting your stitches will ensure a true success of this project **size** **square blanket** - approx 102 x 102 cm 40 x 40 inches remember if you use/choose a different yarn weight/hook size your bag will be a different size **abbreviations us terminology** **pattern support** full pattern support is available from the joanita theron designs facebook group or/and joanita theron designs ravelry group please post a question in the group and remember to tag me i will assist as soon as possible or one of my members will gladly jump in to help for questions relating to permission or usage email joanita@creativecrochetworkshop com
